name: Living Room, Dining Room or Family Room
description:
What will you provide?

  • Photos of several angles of your room(s) and a photo of the exterior of your house.
  • Measurements of the room(s) – We can help you figure out how to properly measure your space.
  • Inspiration photos/style ideas.
  • Answers to a Design Survey we will provide to you.

What will you get?

  • A moodboard showing furniture, art, and accessories.
  • A floor plan showing how to arrange your furniture in a room.
  • Elevation plans for the walls detailing art or furniture installation.
  • 3D Rendering to help visualize final design.
  • A shopping list of all the design elements that can be purchased locally and/or online.
  • Budget Breakdown.
  • Ideas on making each room personal, tips on repurposing items for your space.
  • We can provide these services for local clients as well. They will receive an initial one hour in-home consultation.

How does it work?

After receipt of payment we will begin by contacting you and setting up a shared account (between Birdhouse and You) where you will track the process on the calendar, check your to-do list, upload your photos and measurements, fill out your Design Survey and communicate with Birdhouse.

Finally, you will receive your Design Plan. Rooms are non-refundable, but we certainly want you to be happy with your purchase. Therefore, we are happy to follow-up with your questions and will find replacements for up to three items.

Please note, there are two options: 300 square feet and under, and over 300 square feet.

name: Small Business Package
description:
It is very important for any business to project a professional appearance as well as complement their brand with their environment. If you walk into a graphic design company and the office looks like a generic corporate space full of boring desks and cubicles, you might not trust them with your new creative venture. That’s where we come in. These packages are for small businesses that don’t have a huge budget. With this option, a business can pick a package of hours and we will help them figure out how to make the most of those hours in order to have an amazing space that represents their brand.

We offer a 50-hour package to help jump-start your business. Note: this is not full-service.
